Author: bluishgreen
Content: Not just the web design. But the whole attitude of the page is screaming spam. If this is a good book that you think people here will like, then  inform your friend to reposition it for this audience.

Author: rms
Content: I'd love to do clinical trials, but I don't have tens of millions of dollars. Any suggestions? It seems nearly impossible for an outsider to break into the pharmaceutical industry.

Author: aheilbut
Content:
If you were a pharmaceutical company, and you did the appropriate, properly controlled clinical trials to demonstrate that this stuff is both safe and effective, then it would be OK.

Until you do that, you're walking a fine line between being a snake-oil salesman and a drug dealer.

Author: rms
Content: That's true. Edited. Note that I'm really not trying to make a profit on selling kratom to the news.yc community. I have had two sales that I can specifically track here. Most of our business is coming from Europe now, the collapse of the US dollar is really helping us out.

Author: amichail
Content: I don't find these evolutionary arguments convincing.

Author: dhouston
Content: well, for one, it's disingenuous for someone who sells it to couch its benefits in an "ask yc" post without any kind of disclosure (you'll probably edit your post now, but that's where the hostility came from)

Author: Harj
Content: that is one slick site, awesome :)

Author: ingenium
Content: But WHY do you seem to find this offensive? No one has any problems when other people advertise their startup; that's an accepted use of this site.

Author: rms
Content:
Why? And why do you have such a hostile response? I usually mention Kratom whenever other drugs like alcohol or caffeine come up.

This specific submission was in response to this. http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=71368

Author: rms
Content:
:) ok\nhttp://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=71371

My viewpoint is that all anti-kratom arguments boil down to pro-pharmaceutical company unlogic. In my opinion, to be against what I am doing without hypocrisy, you have to be against the drug-pushing of the US pharmaceutical industry as well.

Author: dhouston
Content: could you please stop advertising (albeit usually indirectly or offhand) this shit on here?

Author: gscott
Content: Buy them, give them 6 months, then redirect them to MSN.com (Steve Balmer starts uncontrollable laughing here).

Author: DanielBMarkham
Content:
Why don't you do a "Ask YC" post. Ask folks if they think it's okay to have a startup business where you sell plants that have psychoactive agents yet are still legal.

\nI like to hear the discussion on that one! (Still thinking it through myself)

Author: rms
Content: This has bounced between 0 and 1 points a couple times now...  I realize this isn't about me promoting my own business, because that is something that definitely allowed and encouraged on this site. I would really like to engage in a discussion with whoever thinks that posts about drugs deserve to be modded down.
